verses.verse: Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H1961>come<s%> upon us: <S%H5027>consider,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
Our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5237>aliens.<s%>
We <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H3490>orphans<s%> and <S%H369>fatherless,<s%> <S%H1><s%> our <S%H517>mothers<s%> are as <S%H490>widows.<s%>
We have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> our <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money;<s%> our <S%H6086>wood<s%> is <S%H935>sold<s%> <S%H4242><s%> unto us.
Our <S%H6677>necks<s%> are <S%H5921>under<s%> <S%H7291>persecution:<s%> we <S%H3021>labor,<s%> and have no <S%H3808>rest.<s%> <S%H5117><s%>
We have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and to the <S%H804>Assyrians,<s%> to be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and are <S%H369>not;<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> have <S%H5445>borne<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
Servants <S%H5650><s%> have ruled <S%H4910>over<s%> us: there is <S%H369>none<s%> that doth <S%H6561>deliver<s%> us out of their <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
We <S%H935>got<s%> our <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the peril of our <S%H5315>lives<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
Our <S%H5785>skin<s%> was <S%H3648>black<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2152>terrible<s%> <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
They <S%H6031>ravished<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and the <S%H1330>maids<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
Princes <S%H8269><s%> are hanged <S%H8518>up<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H2205>elders<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1921>honored.<s%>
They <S%H5375>took<s%> the young <S%H970>men<s%> to <S%H2911>grind,<s%> and the <S%H5288>children<s%> <S%H3782>fell<s%> under the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
The <S%H2205>elders<s%> have <S%H7673>ceased<s%> from the <S%H4480>gate,<s%> <S%H8179><s%> the young <S%H970>men<s%> from their <S%H4480>music.<s%> <S%H5058><s%>
The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7673>ceased;<s%> our <S%H4234>dance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H60>mourning.<s%>
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from our <S%H7218>head:<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> unto us, <S%H3588>that<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned!<s%>
For <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H1739>faint;<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H2821>dim.<s%>
Because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> is <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> upon it.
Thou, <S%H859><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3427>remainest<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> dost thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> us <S%H5331>forever,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> us so <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>time?<s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> thou us <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and we shall be <S%H7725>turned;<s%> <S%H2318>renew<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> as of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thou hast utterly <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3988><s%> us; thou art very <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us.
